mapper.sql: technology_plan_id, technology_id, batch_amount, start_plan, end_plan, commit_plan, technology_plan_start, technology_plan_end
mapper.update: update technology_plan set technology_id = #{technologyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, batch_amount = #{batchAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_plan = #{startPlan,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_plan = #{endPlan,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, commit_plan = #{commitPlan,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, technology_plan_start = #{technologyPlanStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, technology_plan_end = #{technologyPlanEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where technology_plan_id = #{technologyPlanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
